items.category: Sounds as if a zombie is banging on a nearby door or wall. Best use is to spam once every second a few times. No Cooldown.
Sounds as if the helicopter is spawning. Best to use when the survivor is a few days in. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor unequip my weapon. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor couch and shout. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor drop everything in my inventory. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor will start pushing randomly 3 times. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown.. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor will shout. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor will be forced to run for 5 seconds. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor opens every inventory. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown..
Adds a penalty. If I say a specific word, the Survivor shut off my car. 1 per run. 10 Minute Cooldown..
Ai director's way of moving around nearby hordes, it makes it appear as if the nearby zombie hordes are shuffling around. Useful when the survivor is out scavenging. 5 Minute Cooldown.
Ai director's way of moving around hordes in a larger radius then the dog command and makes it appear as if the zombie hordes are shuffling around. 10 Minute Cooldown.
Sounds as if there is a nearby zombie sneaking up on Snack. Best used when doing something that keeps my character locked into place such as scavenging or TV time. 1 Minute Cooldown.
Makes a sound of a zombie breaking into a nearby window. Best used to keep Snack on his toes. 1 Minute Cooldown.
Makes a sound of a zombie breaking into a window further away such as another room/floor of the same building. Best used to keep Snack on his toes. 1 Minute Cooldown.
Makes a sound of a zombie banging on a nearby window. Best use is to spam once every second a few times. No Cooldown.
Sounds as if a house alarm is going off. Best used when Snack enters a house for the first time. 5 Minute Cooldown.
